tha-ap291:1.4_0: in that great sage, a sage.
tha-ap291:2.1_0: These others will recite the Monastic Code,
tha-ap291:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap291:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap291:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap291:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
tha-ap291:7.1_0: The ninth part of the Buddhas, the ninth sub-chapter on the senior monks.
